content.description: Standing start with your feet under the overhanging base of the boulder. This problem starts on the right side using the crack. Fight your feet up to the lip then move up the easier slab to the top.
content.location: Undertow boulder is 20ft east of the Tombstone boulder up the little draw.

content.description: Climb tombstone using both sides of the stone.
content.location: Up to the left of the canyon

content.description: The slender east face of the tombstone boulder. Grasp both sides and smear your feet up the center.
content.protection: Bad fall zone. Use spotters and extra pads.
content.location: Route ascends the center of the east face.

content.description: Start on the left side of undertow boulder using the arete/edge. Move up and over the lip and then through the slab using the left edge. Fun hard start leads to easy finish.
content.location: Undertow boulder is 20ft east of the Tombstone boulder up the little draw.

content.description: The 'Circle of Life' is a traverse around the tombstone boulder. Start as for 'Bones to the Wall' and climb up the rail. At the top of the rail proceed around the arete making sure not to use the top of the boulder. Traverse across the South face and onto the East face. Then climb down the east face and around the corner with your feet where your hands started. Now you have completed the circle of life.Doing this route in reverse is the 'Benjamin Button' you would be 'Buttoning'.
content.protection: Lots of pads or one pad and an active spotter
content.location: On the Tombstone boulder, start as for 'Bones'.

content.description:
Sit start with hands low on the rail. Move up and right along the rail. A little of everything gets you up to the right edge of the boulder where you can move through bigger holds to the top.

Down climb any way you like.
content.location: route is on the north face of the boulder

content.description: On the north east arete of the tombstone boulder. Standing start with left hand on the arete, right hand underclinging. Work your way straight up the arete to the top.
content.location: Problem is on the northeast arete of the tombstone boulder
